entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Patrimonio neto with a value of 13,907,013,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 504,055,000 + 2,131,896,000 ) with a value of 2,635,951,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3
Rule Element Id:9542 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231.zip/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231/reports/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231-es.xhtml 1687

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Patrimonio neto with a value of 13,394,329,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 1,174,689,000 + 2,337,779,000 ) with a value of 3,512,468,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3
Rule Element Id:9542 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231.zip/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231/reports/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231-es.xhtml 1687

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1001002 - Statement - Statement of financial position, order of liquidity (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentRemainingInStatementOfFinancialPositionForHedgedItemThatCeasedToBeAdjustedForHedgingGainsAndLossesLiabilities, ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss, scf:ExposicionesFueraDeBalance, ifrs-full:AssetsUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued, ifrs-full:InvestmentProperty, ifrs-full:DepositsFromBanks, scf:ExposicionesFueraDeBalanceCompromisosDePrestamoConcedidos, scf:ExposicionesFueraDeBalanceOtrosCompromisosConcedidos, ifrs-full:SubordinatedLiabilities, ifrs-full:LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks, ifrs-full:MandatoryReserveDepositsAtCentralBanks, scf:ExposicionesFueraDeBalanceGarantiasFinancierasConcedidas, ifrs-full:CorporateLoans, ifrs-full:DepositsFromCustomers, ifrs-full:ConsumerLoans, scf:ProMemoriaAdquiridoEnArrendamiento, scf:FondosPropios All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,230,356,000 reported in the network role http://www.santanderconsumer.com/role/StatementofcomprehensiveincomeOCIcomponentspresentedbeforetaxStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 1,174,689,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.santanderconsumer.com/role/StatementofchangesinequityStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231.zip/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231/reports/5493000LM0MZ4JPMGM90-20211231-es.xhtml 1687
